html:
{% set project_doc = frappe.get_doc('Project', doc.project_title) %}

Project Charter

{{ project_doc.project_name }}


Project Sponsor: {{ doc.project_sponsor }}
Project Manager: {{ doc.project_manager }}
Start Date: {{ doc.creation_date }}
End Date: {{ doc.schedule }}

















Prepared by the Project Management Office

{% set current_year = frappe.utils.nowdate() %} {% set current_year = current_year.split('-')[0] %}

© {{ current_year }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "company_name") }}. All Rights Reserved.

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "company_name") }}

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "website") }}
{{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "phone_no") }}

Project Charter: {{ project_doc.project_name }}

Project Information

Project Title: {{ project_doc.project_name }}

Project Sponsor: {{ doc.project_sponsor }}

Project Manager: {{ doc.project_manager }}

Date: {{ doc.creation_date }}

Initial Budget: {{ doc.initial_budget }}

Schedule: {{ doc.schedule }}

1. Project Purpose

{{ doc.project_purpose }}

2. Business Need / Business Case

    {% for item in doc.business_needbusiness_case %}
  • {{ item.business_needbusiness_case }}
    • {% endfor %}

3. Project Objectives

    {% for item in doc.project_objectives %}
  • {{ item.project_objectives }}
    • {% endfor %}

4. Project Scope

In-Scope:

    {% for item in doc.project_scope %}
  • {{ item.project_scope }}
    • {% endfor %}

Out-of-Scope:

    {% for item in doc.excluded_services %}
  • {{ item.excluded_services }}
    • {% endfor %}

5. Key Stakeholders

{% for item in doc.key_stakeholders %} {% set stakeholder_type_doc = frappe.get_doc('Stakeholder Type', item.stakeholder_type) %} {% if item.party_type1 == 'Employee' %} {% set stakeholder_name = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', item.stakeholder_name, 'employee_name') %} {% elif item.party_type1 == 'Customer' %} {% set stakeholder_name = frappe.db.get_value('Customer', item.stakeholder_name, 'customer_name') %} {% else %} {% set stakeholder_name = item.stakeholder_name %} {# Fallback to ID #} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Party Type Stakeholder Type Stakeholder Name Role
{{ item.party_type1 }} {{ stakeholder_type_doc.stakeholder_type }} {{ stakeholder_name }} {{ item.role | replace("\n", "
") | safe }}

6. Key Deliverables (High-Level Requirements)

    {% for item in doc.key_deliverables %}
  • {{ item.key_deliverables }}
    • {% endfor %}

7. Milestones

{% for item in doc.milestones %} {% endfor %}
Milestone Estimated Completion Date
{{ item.milestones }} {{ item.estimated_completion_date }}

8. Budget

{% for item in doc.budget %} {% set project_budget_category_doc = frappe.get_doc('Project Budget Category', item.category) %} {% endfor %}
Category Estimated Cost
{{ project_budget_category_doc.category }} {{ item.estimated_cost }}

9. Payment Plan

{% for item in doc.payment_plan %} {% set payment_against_doc = frappe.get_doc('Payment Against', item.payment_against) %} {% set payment_type_doc = frappe.get_doc('Payment Type', item.payment_type) %} {% endfor %}
Payment Against Payment Type Payment Amount Payment Percentage Payment Due Date Description of Deliverable
{{ payment_against_doc.payment_against }} {{ payment_type_doc.payment_type }} {{ item.payment_amount }} {{ item.payment_percentage }} {{ item.payment_due_date }} {{ item.description_of_deliverable }}

10. Risks and Mitigation

{% for item in doc.risks %} {% endfor %}
Risk Probability Impact Mitigation Strategy
{{ item.risk }} {{ item.probability }} {{ item.impact }} {{ item.mitigation_strategy }}

11. Service Assumptions (Success Criteria)

    {% for item in doc.service_assumptions %}
  • {{ item.service_assumptions }}
    • {% endfor %}

12. Constraints

    {% for item in doc.constraints %}
  • {{ item.constraints }}
    • {% endfor %}

13. Communication Plan

Risks Levels

{% for item in doc.risk_levels %} {% set customer_escalate_to_doc = frappe.get_doc('Stakeholder Type', item.customer_escalate_to) %} {% set service_provider_escalate_to_doc = frappe.get_doc('Stakeholder Type', item.service_provider_escalate_to) %} {% endfor %}
Risk Level Risk Description Response Time (hrs) Escalation Response Time (hrs) Customer Escalate to Service Provider Escalate to
{{ item.risk_level }} {{ item.risk_description }} {{ item.response_time }} {{ item.escalation_response_time }} {{ customer_escalate_to_doc.stakeholder_type }} {{ service_provider_escalate_to_doc.stakeholder_type }}

Review Meetings

Team Weekly Status Review Members

{% for item in doc.team_weekly_status_review_members %} {% set stakeholder_type_doc = frappe.get_doc('Stakeholder Type', item.role) %} {% if item.party_type1 == 'Employee' %} {% set stakeholder_name = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', item.member_name, 'employee_name') %} {% elif item.party_type1 == 'Customer' %} {% set stakeholder_name = frappe.db.get_value('Customer', item.member_name, 'customer_name') %} {% else %} {% set stakeholder_name = item.stakeholder_name %} {# Fallback to ID #} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Role Party Type Member Name Responsibilities
{{ stakeholder_type_doc.stakeholder_type }} {{ item.party_type1 }} {{ stakeholder_name }} {{ item.responsibilities | replace("\n", "
") | safe }}
